text:
You're stuck on an endless loop with ChatGPT.

Here's how to get out of it (3 steps):

1. Recognize the loop.

LLMs like ChatGPT hallucinate.

They get stuck in endless loops of answers, without taking into consideration your follow-up prompts.

I realized that:
☑ No prompt engineering can get you out.
☑ It happens more with "search" activated.
☑ It happens more on gpt-4o (non-reasoning).

Here's what to do instead:

2. Edit past prompts.

☑ Instead of writing follow-up prompts...
↳ Edit your past prompt with a different approach.

☑ Instead of brute forcing a model like gpt-4o...
↳ Edit a past prompt + change the model.

But the very best solution is obviously to...

3. Start all over again.

☑ Choose the o3 model over anything else.
↳ It's the one that hallucinates the least.

☑ Avoid searching + reasoning at the same time.
↳ Search first and then follow up with reasoning.

☑ Ask to think step by step.
↳ Not everything, all at once. Lay down the steps.
